product_name: Royal Robbins Elena Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Featuring a pointelle stitch, a scalloped hem and a soft fabric blend, the Royal Robbins Elena hoodie brings laid-back style and comfort to your casual look. Rich fabric blend brings together acrylic, polyester, wool and nylon for a soft touch and great shape retention; fabric dries quickly and regulates temperature well. Ties cinch down the hood for extra warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring a pointelle stitch, a scalloped hem and a soft fabric blend, the Royal Robbins Elena hoodie brings laid-back style and comfort to your casual look.
